title: Assert failed in `edit_mail_istream_read`

profile.name: Open-Xchange
profile.about: Messaging, collaboration and office productivity software for service providers

vulnerability_information:
To reproduce, run test suite on following input :
```
require "vnd.dovecot.testsuite";
require "variables";
require "editheader";


test_set "message" "${mege}";
test "" {	addheader :last "der" "Her-3";

	if not test_result_execute {
		
	}

}
```

## Impact

I do not think there is a security impact, but there might be one as this assert is followed by the condition `append_v_offset <= hdr_size - 1` where we will have an unsigned integer underflow when `hdr_size == 0` as is the case here

activities.message: This is caused by the empty input message. The problem is practically limited to the test suite; empty messages are not encountered in practice. I have a fix.
This is not a security issue, and we thank you for taking time to report this to us. We will fix this bug eventually.
